title: Only You
lyrics:
[intro] (C7)
 
Only (F)you
Can make all this (A7)world seem right
Only (Dm)you
Can make the (F7)darkness bright
Only (Bb)you and you a(C)lone
Can (F)thrill me (A7)like you (Dm)do (D7)
And (G7)fill my heart with love for only (C7)you
 
(C7-stop)O-O-O-Only (F)you
Can make all this (A7)change in me
For it's (Dm)true
You are my (F7)destiny
When you (Bb)hold my hand,
I (Bbm)understand
The (F)magic (A7)that you (D7)do
You're my (G7)dream come true
My (C7)one and only (F)you
 
(C7-stop)O-O-O-Only (F)you
Can make all this (A7)change in me
For it's (Dm)true
You are my (F7)destiny
When you (Bb)hold my hand,
I (Bbm)understand
The (F)magic (A7)that you (D7)do
You're my (G7)dream come true
My (C7)one and only (F)you
[slow down] My (C7)one and only (F - tremolo)you [end]
